activities: Datalogix receives personal and other information gathered online and offline concerning consumer purchase behavior, demographics, interests and interactions/relationships with online and offline businesses in Datalogix’s provision of certain Cloud services. Datalogix collects, transfers and uses this information for a range of purposes, including enabling interest-based advertising, analyzing advertising effectiveness, conducting related research and analytics, and providing other marketing services. Datalogix maintains a privacy policy for the personal information it collects in connection with its online and offline business activities.
